abstract: Harvey Araton On Basketball column on NBA labor dispute resulting in cancellation of the first two weeks of the season; holds that players must be willing to assume some risk to gain leverage in collective-bargaining talks.
snippet: The N.B.A. players grabbed the role of a brooding breed punished by the league’s commissioner, but in the public eye there is little difference between which set of millionaires is to blame.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. players grabbed the role of a brooding breed punished by the league’s commissioner, but in the public eye there is little difference between which set of millionaires is to blame.

headline.main: For Players, Gaining Leverage Will Take Some Risk
headline.print_headline: For N.B.A. Players, Gaining Leverage Will Take Some Risk
headline.seo: For N.B.A. Players, Gaining Leverage Will Require Sacrifice
